summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: [miclan] Honey Teatree Relaxing Mask 10pcs - Mediheal Family Brand Facial Sheet Mask Full of Hydrating Soothing Purifying Skin with Teatree and Honey
Review Date: 2020/07/26
Store: miclan
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Miclan', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Soothing,Skin Soothing,Soothes', 'Scent': 'Honey', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Package Dimensions': '7.91 x 4.25 x 1.5 inches; 11.99 Ounces'}
Review Text: Great mask to use after a long day. The mask is well coated with the honey tea tree serum on a mesh-like sheet. I use the extra serum in the package and apply it on my neck and arms. It's soothing and refreshing, and the scent is not to strong. It made my skin feel soft and supple. It didn't irritate my skin at all. Next time, I'll put it in fridge prior to using for a more cooling experience.
Review Title: Great face mask
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Silicone Back Scrubber For Shower,Strong Rub Back Mud Silica Gel Bath Towel, Easy to Clean, All Parts Of The Body To Remove Ash And Mud
Review Date: 2020/08/02
Store: LHIUEM
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Material': 'Silicone', 'Brand': 'LHIUEM', 'Operation Mode': 'Manual', 'Package Dimensions': '11.02 x 7.87 x 2.48 inches; 1.21 Pounds', 'UPC': '791523116391'}
Review Text: It does lightly scrub the back a bit. Lathers and spreads the body wash well, however, it is sort of heavy and a pain to use. I’ll still use it but not on a daily basis. I hang it over the shower door because there’s no where to rest it in the tub area
Review Title: It’s okay
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: BRING GREEN Artemisia Calming Real Pack 100g - Redness Relief Skin Soothing & Moisturizing Facial Wash off Mask, Mild Salicylic Acid Natural Ingredients Skin Care, for Senstive & Damaged Skin
Review Date: 2020/08/08
Store: BRING GREEN
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'BRING GREEN', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'acne prone', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.4 x 2.9 x 2.9 inches; 8.78 Ounces'}
Review Text: I like the cooling effect it gave when I applied it to my skin. It comes with a big spatula that you use to apply and remove the gel. I use this 1-2x week to give my irritated skin a break. Had to refer back to their amazon product page to get the directions on how to use and for how long. I apply a good amount to my face and leave it on for 20 minutes. The gel smells very herbal and has tiny bits of artemisia leaf in it.  The mask did help reduce the redness on my cheeks and nose. It left my skin feeling moisturized and refreshed. Definitely recommend for people with irritated and oily skin or after a long week of wearing a tight N95 mask.
Review Title: Very cooling
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Glow Line Individual Hand Wipes - Hand Wipes Travel Size, Lavender Rose Travel Hand Wipes - Moist Towelettes Individually Wrapped, Wet Wipes Individually Wrapped w/Murumuru Seed & Peptides - 15 ct
Review Date: 2020/11/29
Store: BUSYCO
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'BUSYCO', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Unit Count': '15.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '4.5 x 7.3 x 3.5 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
Review Text: These wipes are okay to use when your hands are feeling soiled. They're saturated and well stay pretty wet for a few minutes or so.  Unscented and doesn't leave my hands dry or sticky. The size of the wipe is a little smaller compared to other hand wipes. The wipes do have phenoxyethanol, which can contain trace amounts of 1, -dioxane (carcinogen) but apparently it's safe at low levels (FYI). It's stated on the box that they try to be zero waste, but honestly... not really. They come individually packaged in a plastic bag and in a box, which are both not biodegradable. It would've been better if the wipes came all together in one packet instead of individual packs. It would've reduced some waste. The wipes are expensive at $.90 each. Not worth it in my opinion.
Review Title: Biodegradable wipes but not the packaging
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hylunia Hydrate Body Wash - Energizing Blend With Mango 8.5 oz
Review Date: 2020/12/14
Store: Hylunia
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 5 inches; 11.22 Ounces', 'Item model number': '059ENM-250-R', 'UPC': '185449000313'}
Review Text: This body wash isn't the best. You need at least 5-8 pumps for it to somewhat lather and coat the skin. I use a body glove with this wash by the way. The scent smells okay, however, it does smell like stuff you'd use to clean the bathroom or other household objects. Haven't had an allergic reactions to it. It doesn't really moisturize but doesn't strip the skin and dry it out. Great that it is vegan and plant-derived but there's nothing special about this body wash. I wouldn't recommend it.
Review Title: Meh, doesn't lather well
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MIZON Real Vitamin C Ampoule, Pure Vitamin C, No Water Added,10 Ingredients, Tone correction treatment, Nutrition, Face Moisturizer (1.01 fl oz)
Review Date: 2021/02/15
Store: MIZON
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MIZON', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin C', 'Unit Count': '1.01 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.1 x 2.7 x 1.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces'}
Review Text: It’s a great vitamin C ampoule but you need to use it within 3 mths. I keep it in the fridge to extend the life of this serum. It’s slightly thick like oil and has a very pale yellow hue to it. The scent of this stuff is faint and subtle but doesn’t smell bad. It’s kept in a dark glass bottle to prevent light when effecting the serum. It absorbs into the skin well and it has helped with my skin complexion. Great stuff!
Review Title: Keep chilled
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Spove Spiral Hair Ties Hair Coils Hair Coil Seamless Non-slip Mixed Ponytail Holder Hair Ties for Women & Kids 15pcs
Review Date: 2021/04/17
Store: SPOVE
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Material': 'Plastic, Cotton', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'SPOVE', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Number of Pieces': '15', 'Package Dimensions': '6.54 x 5.83 x 1.3 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '631145785158'}
Review Text: Love these hair ties. You get a great assortment of the spiral cord, regular cotton ties and one small pink scrunchie. They do a good job of keeping my thick hair up without tugging on my hair. Usually I need 2 of the goodie brand hair ties to keep my hair up the way I want but just one of these ties does the trick. They’re are a tad tight to keep on my wrist but the ties come in a nice carrying bag. With goodie hair ties I usually stretchy them out after 10+ uses. Hoping these will be durable. For the price, it’s a great deal!
Review Title: Great for thick hair
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: FASCY LAB GREEN+ Korean Sunscreen — SPF 50+PA++++, Daily Facial Sunscreen, Sun Cream With Patented Ingredients, Korean Spf, Korean Sun Cream for Face — Paraben Free [1 x 1.69 Fl.Oz.]
Review Date: 2021/04/18
Store: Fascy
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Sun Protection': '50 SPF', 'Item Weight': '50 Milligrams', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.69 Fl Oz', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Item model number': 'KC'}
Review Text: I’m loving this sunscreen so far! It’s lightweight and leaves a nice matte/satin finish on my skin. It actually doesn’t make my skin oily nor leave a whitecast. The product feels like a lotion that glides on easy and absorbs well into my skin. There’s almost no scent to it, which is a plus. It contains pretty good ingredients to prevent water loss and keeps the skin hydrated and reduces the look of wrinkles! Definitely will be my go-to summer sunscreen!
Review Title: Great for my oily skin!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Spanature Green Tea Hand & Body Lotion Travel Size Selection, 4 Pack, Revitalizing Moisturizer for Rough and Dry Skin, Nourishing and Gentle for All Skin Types, Made In Korea - 75 ml/2.53oz
Review Date: 2021/05/16
Store: Spanature
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Spanature', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Active Ingredients': 'Green tea', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.9 x 2.1 x 1.9 inches; 8.8 Ounces'}
Review Text: The lotion is just okay, nothing too special about it. The consistency is definitely like lotion and more on the thinner side. I prefer a more creamy texture for hand creams. The scent is okay, more like a powder green tea type scent. Easy squeeze bottle and screw on cap. You get 4 nicely individually packaged lotions that would make a great gift or stocking stuffer. Wouldn't get this again.
Review Title: Just okay, nothing great
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LIQUE Cosmetics Moisturizing Cream Lipstick, Lightweight, Comfortable Formula with Rich Pigment for Visibly Fully Lips and All-Day Wear, Dreamy, 0.11 Oz.
Review Date: 2022/01/08
Store: LIQUE
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'LIQUE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Cream', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Shine,Moisturizing,Exfoliating', 'Coverage': 'Lightweight', 'Package Dimensions': '3.82 x 0.91 x 0.87 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '017754373397'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:f5186c2a8d0ee855988958b8d347349f]] The packaging is nice but I’m not a fan of the shape of the lipstick. When twisting to get my product the lipstick would retract back. It’s weird to apply it at the corners of the lips. Also, when I opened the cap, a bit of the lipstick corner smudged against the lid. It glides on easy, isn’t sticky and it’s very moisturizing the color is vibrant. It’s not an all-day lip product because this can easily come off when eating or drinking. For 13.99? Nah..not worth it. It’s cheaper and better long lasting lipsticks out there
Review Title: Weird shape, not long lasting
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES Moisturizing Shampoo Bar | For Curly Hair | Hair Care, Ideal Ph Balance |Natural, Vegan | Eco-friendly, Sustainable, Plastic Free | Waterless & Zero Waste
Review Date: 2022/01/20
Store: B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES', 'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly, Dry', 'Scent': 'Citric and Woody', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.56 x 2.56 x 1.46 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES', 'Country of Origin': 'Brazil'}
Review Text: I like that this bar held its shape and that it’s easy to hold onto. The bar is about the size of a small mandarin orange. It lather ups my hair pretty well and has a slight rosemary scent to it. I’ll lather, rinse, repeat and go in with a silicone head massager. I’ll follow with my own conditioner. I’ll wash off the excess foam and place the bar back onto the paper it came in. I did notice that the shampoo did slight fade my purplish hair and made it look a bit brassy so I won’t use this too long often. Overall, good eco friendly solid shampoo, the price is similar to that of other solid shampoo brands. Be cautious with some colored hair though.
Review Title: This shampoo is solid ;)
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: GLO to Go Teeth Whitening Pen — Easy to Use, Safe & Effective Dentist-Invented Whitening Treatment — Designed for Sensitive Teeth, Travel Friendly, Cinnamint Flavor
Review Date: 2022/06/11
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'GLO Science', 'Product Benefits': 'Natural plant-based ingredients help promote a clean and healthy smile and noticeably whiter teeth in 1 week.Natural plant-based ingredients help promote a clean and healthy smile and noticeably whiter teeth in 1 week.   See more', 'Item Form': 'Pen', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Included Components': 'Teeth Whitening Pen', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 2 x 3 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28103305', 'UPC': '857181002510', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/RPTMQ'}
Review Text: Love the convenience of this pen, just wish the gel would come out a better way. First off, it took FIVEver to expression the gel out. I think I clicked the bottom 50 times before a tiny bead of gel started to appear, I had to aggressively click and slam the pen onto the counter to get more product out. Once I was finally able to get enough product out, I dried my teeth (after flossing and brushing first) and wiped the silicone bristles onto my teeth from premolar to  premolar on my upper and lower teeth, I used the box it came in to fan and dry off my teeth. I did this before bed time so I wouldn’t have the urge to eat or drink after. The gel will become stringy once your inner lips and cheek touch the gel and there’s a mild taste to it.  So far I’ve used this pen nightly for 4 days and I’ve seen a tiny bit of results. You’re supposed to use it twice a day for 2 weeks. I haven’t experienced any sensitivity from the gel, partly because I’ll use sensodyne toothpaste to brush and the gel is formulated with potassium nitrate that helps prevent sensitivity. Other good ingredients include xylitol and natural antioxidants. Overall good product, just need a better way to get the product out without having to click it. Twisting would be a better option and maybe transparent packaging so you know how much product is left.
Review Title: Good so far
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

Product Details: {'Brand': 'BRING GREEN', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'acne prone', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.4 x 2.9 x 2.9 inches; 8.78 Ounces'}
Review Text: I like the cooling effect it gave when I applied it to my skin. It comes with a big spatula that you use to apply and remove the gel. I use this 1-2x week to give my irritated skin a break. Had to refer back to their amazon product page to get the directions on how to use and for how long. I apply a good amount to my face and leave it on for 20 minutes. The gel smells very herbal and has tiny bits of artemisia leaf in it.  The mask did help reduce the redness on my cheeks and nose. It left my skin feeling moisturized and refreshed. Definitely recommend for people with irritated and oily skin or after a long week of wearing a tight N95 mask.
Review Title: Very cooling
Rating: 5.0

Product Title: Glow Line Individual Hand Wipes - Hand Wipes Travel Size, Lavender Rose Travel Hand Wipes - Moist Towelettes Individually Wrapped, Wet Wipes Individually Wrapped w/Murumuru Seed & Peptides - 15 ct
Review Date: 2020/11/29
Store: BUSYCO
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'BUSYCO', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Unit Count': '15.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '4.5 x 7.3 x 3.5 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
Review Text: These wipes are okay to use when your hands are feeling soiled. They're saturated and well stay pretty wet for a few minutes or so.  Unscented and doesn't leave my hands dry or sticky. The size of the wipe is a little smaller compared to other hand wipes. The wipes do have phenoxyethanol, which can contain trace amounts of 1, -dioxane (carcinogen) but apparently it's safe at low levels (FYI). It's stated on the box that they try to be zero waste, but honestly... not really. They come individually packaged in a plastic bag and in a box, which are both not biodegradable. It would've been better if the wipes came all together in one packet instead of individual packs. It would've reduced some waste. The wipes are expensive at $.90 each. Not worth it in my opinion.
Review Title: Biodegradable wipes but not the packaging
Rating: 2.0

Review Text: This body wash isn't the best. You need at least 5-8 pumps for it to somewhat lather and coat the skin. I use a body glove with this wash by the way. The scent smells okay, however, it does smell like stuff you'd use to clean the bathroom or other household objects. Haven't had an allergic reactions to it. It doesn't really moisturize but doesn't strip the skin and dry it out. Great that it is vegan and plant-derived but there's nothing special about this body wash. I wouldn't recommend it.

Product Details: {'Brand': 'B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES', 'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly, Dry', 'Scent': 'Citric and Woody', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.56 x 2.56 x 1.46 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES', 'Country of Origin': 'Brazil'}
Review Text: I like that this bar held its shape and that it’s easy to hold onto. The bar is about the size of a small mandarin orange. It lather ups my hair pretty well and has a slight rosemary scent to it. I’ll lather, rinse, repeat and go in with a silicone head massager. I’ll follow with my own conditioner. I’ll wash off the excess foam and place the bar back onto the paper it came in. I did notice that the shampoo did slight fade my purplish hair and made it look a bit brassy so I won’t use this too long often. Overall, good eco friendly solid shampoo, the price is similar to that of other solid shampoo brands. Be cautious with some colored hair though.
Review Title: This shampoo is solid ;)
Rating: 4.0

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: GLO to Go Teeth Whitening Pen — Easy to Use, Safe & Effective Dentist-Invented Whitening Treatment — Designed for Sensitive Teeth, Travel Friendly, Cinnamint Flavor
Review Date: 2022/06/11
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'GLO Science', 'Product Benefits': 'Natural plant-based ingredients help promote a clean and healthy smile and noticeably whiter teeth in 1 week.Natural plant-based ingredients help promote a clean and healthy smile and noticeably whiter teeth in 1 week.   See more', 'Item Form': 'Pen', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Included Components': 'Teeth Whitening Pen', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 2 x 3 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28103305', 'UPC': '857181002510', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/RPTMQ'}
Review Text: Love the convenience of this pen, just wish the gel would come out a better way. First off, it took FIVEver to expression the gel out. I think I clicked the bottom 50 times before a tiny bead of gel started to appear, I had to aggressively click and slam the pen onto the counter to get more product out. Once I was finally able to get enough product out, I dried my teeth (after flossing and brushing first) and wiped the silicone bristles onto my teeth from premolar to  premolar on my upper and lower teeth, I used the box it came in to fan and dry off my teeth. I did this before bed time so I wouldn’t have the urge to eat or drink after. The gel will become stringy once your inner lips and cheek touch the gel and there’s a mild taste to it.  So far I’ve used this pen nightly for 4 days and I’ve seen a tiny bit of results. You’re supposed to use it twice a day for 2 weeks. I haven’t experienced any sensitivity from the gel, partly because I’ll use sensodyne toothpaste to brush and the gel is formulated with potassium nitrate that helps prevent sensitivity. Other good ingredients include xylitol and natural antioxidants. Overall good product, just need a better way to get the product out without having to click it. Twisting would be a better option and maybe transparent packaging so you know how much product is left.
Review Title: Good so far
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
raw_response:
**Genuine Preferences and Patterns:**

1. **Skincare Focused**: Purchases primarily include facial masks and serums, demonstrating a solid interest in skin health and soothing products, particularly for sensitive or irritated skin.

2. **Natural Ingredients**: Preference for products featuring natural or eco-friendly ingredients, indicating a mindful approach to skincare and body care.

3. **Hydration & Soothing**: Favor products that offer hydration and soothing effects, often opting for items with calming and moisturizing properties.

4. **Effective yet practical**: Seeks practical solutions that deliver results, evidenced by frequent feedback on product effectiveness (e.g., moisturization, soothing, mildness).

5. **Scent Sensitivity**: Displays a preference for products with subtle or pleasant scents, avoiding overwhelming fragrances.

6. **Travel-Friendly Options**: Illustrated through the selection of travel-sized and easy-to-use products, indicating a lifestyle that values convenience and portability.

7. **Occasional Disappointments**: Experiences with inconsistent product satisfaction (e.g., body wash and hand wipes), suggesting a critical eye towards value and effectiveness.

8. **Hair Care Concerns**: Interest in hair care products that cater to specific needs (e.g., thickness), showing an attention to hair health as well.

9. **Eco-Conscious Choices**: A tendency to support sustainable and zero-waste products, reflecting growing awareness of environmental impact. 

Overall, the individual's shopping history highlights a commitment to skincare, natural ingredients, practicality, and eco-consciousness.

target_interaction.title: helped brighten skin
target_interaction.text: I liked that it was unscented and the serum absorbed into my skin quickly. You have to activate the vitamin by plunging the top of the cap in to release the powder. The cap has a dropper in it to help control the amount of serum comes out. The serum was quite runny and it would drip off my hand so I had to cup my hand to prevent it from going everywhere. The bottle is small and is best to used up within 2 weeks. I ended up getting 3 weeks out of this bottle. I used it day and night and noticed my sun spots slightly lighten up. It didn't irritate my skin which I liked. I applied this after toning and before my sunscreen. Good stuff but dislike how runny it was, it was like water. The lotion I didn't care for to much but I like the pouch it came in. You can use it after to store another toiletries, etc.
target_interaction.title_meta: Trilogy Vitamin C Brightening Set - For Dull Skin - Made in New Zealand
